title: Natural gradient of slope should be maintained during quarrying operations
clause_text: Natural gradient of slope should be maintained during quarrying operations. Slope of the foot- wall side (Slope in the direction in which mining does not exist) should be properly organized by planting adequate trees of suitable species so as to have soil binding vegetation.
